name: Bonogurashi: Kore de Kanpeki Disu
overview: Bonogurashi Kore de Kanpeki Disu is a mix between an adventure game since the player can use items to advance in the game and a simulation game since the player has to give food or make his character sleep to recover his health. During the game the player has to do different actions with the animals to have a better relationship with them.
